languages.text: "Гиблое дело — отпускать бесноватого. Все окрест кровью зальет, испортит своим скверным душегубством".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Гиблое это дело — отпускать одержимца. От проклятого судьбой не жди добра. Все окрест себя кровью омоет, прежде чем сам в ней захлебнется".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "It would be folly to let a possessed man roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."
languages.original_text: "Гиблое дело — отпускать бесноватого. Все окрест кровью зальет, испортит своим скверным душегубством".

traits.locale_text: "It would be folly to let a man possessed roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."
"It would be folly to let a man possessed roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."
"It would be folly to let a possessed man roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."

"It would be folly to let a possessed man roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."
"It would be folly to let a possessed man roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."

languages.text: "Es wäre töricht, einen Besessenen frei herumlaufen zu lassen. Er würde diesen Ort in Blut tränken und mit seiner Mordlust vergiften."
languages.original_text: "It would be folly to let a possessed man roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre töricht, einen Besessenen frei herumlaufen zu lassen. Er würde diesen Ort in Blut tränken und mit seiner Mordlust vergiften."

languages.text: « Ce serait de la folie de laisser le champ libre à un homme possédé. Il continuerait ses meurtres abjects en inondant cet endroit de sang et de poison. »
languages.original_text: "It would be folly to let a possessed man roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."

traits.locale_text: « Ce serait de la folie de laisser le champ libre à un homme possédé. Il continuerait ses meurtres abjects en inondant cet endroit de sang et de poison. »

languages.text: “若是让这个被恶咒附身的人逍遥法外，那就太愚蠢了。他会用邪恶的屠戮毒害这片土地，让这里血流成河。”
languages.original_text: "It would be folly to let a possessed man roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."

traits.locale_text: “若是让这个被恶咒附身的人逍遥法外，那就太愚蠢了。他会用邪恶的屠戮毒害这片土地，让这里血流成河。”

languages.text: «Sería una necedad dejar libre a un hombre poseído. Hundiría este lugar en sangre y veneno con su espantosa brutalidad».
languages.original_text: "It would be folly to let a possessed man roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."

traits.locale_text: «Sería una necedad dejar libre a un hombre poseído. Hundiría este lugar en sangre y veneno con su espantosa brutalidad».

languages.text: 「憑かれた男を野放しにするのは愚の骨頂だ。この場所は血に沈み、奴のおぞましい殺戮で毒されることになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "It would be folly to let a possessed man roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."

traits.locale_text: 「憑かれた男を野放しにするのは愚の骨頂だ。この場所は血に沈み、奴のおぞましい殺戮で毒されることになるだろう」

languages.text: "Ele geçirilmiş bir adamı serbest bırakmak çılgınlık olur. Burayı kana boğar, iğrenç bir katliama sebep olup mahveder."
languages.original_text: "It would be folly to let a possessed man roam free. He would drown this place in blood and poison it with his foul butchery."

traits.locale_text: "Ele geçirilmiş bir adamı serbest bırakmak çılgınlık olur. Burayı kana boğar, iğrenç bir katliama sebep olup mahveder."
